Title: Authorizes and requires the board of regents to set acceptable standards for the issuance of diplomas to students who are homeschooled
Summary: Authorizes and requires the board of regents to set acceptable standards for the issuance of diplomas to students who are homeschooled.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to authorizing and requiring the board of regents to set acceptable standards for the issuance of diplomas to students who are homeschooled
